CustomFormAuthenticationMechanismDefinition - Annotation Type in javax.security.enterprise.authentication.mechanism.http
Annotation used to define a container AuthenticationMechanism that implements authentication mechanism resembling the Servlet FORM one (Servlet spec 13.6.3).
